General: I am enough exactly as I am.
I give myself permission to grow at my own pace.
I am learning to trust the journey, even when I do not understand it.
I am proud of how far I've come.
I deserve peace, love, and clarity.
I am becoming who I'm meant to be.
Abundance: The universe is not on a budget
Everything I need comes to me fast and easy
Manifest: Energy is shifting in my favour
The universe always got my back.
